attributes.action: Order Vauxhall To Recall All EPS Fautly Vehicles Regardless of Age, Service History or Miliage!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We urge the Prime Minister to order Vauxhall Motor Company to recall and repair or replace all of their vehicles affected by the EPS fault, regardless of Age, Service History and Miliage of the vehicle.
This is a serious issue with hundreds of owners fearing for their families and their own lives due to sudden loss of Power Assisted Steering.

rejection.details: The petitions website is unlikely to be the correct avenue for your concerns. Please try contacting Consumer Direct http://www.consumerdirect.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
